name: historical_prices
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool osrs_live_prices.
Tool description: Grand exchange data for old school runescape items. 
API description: Fetches a list of the high and low prices for the specified item at the given time interval.

timestep.description: The interval at which to fetch price data (e.g., 'daily', 'hourly').

itemid.description: The unique identifier for the item.
